EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1561483260.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1561483260.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon Sandra,
I hope all is well with you today. I spoke with Sarah as I was informed that Samantha is on maternity leave right now and I told that you are taking over the office procurement for the time being. I am not sure if Samantha provided my contact information to you as I am your Account Manager with Grand & Toy. If there is anything I can assist with please let me know. Thank you and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents

If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited.
